description: 21 years old, born on 21st September 2003 (Sunday, 6:40 AM) in Madurai, Tamil Nadu

Attended conferences, hackathons, webinars, and workshops at SSN, NIT Trichy, IIT Madras, Chennai Institute of Technology, Rajalakshmi Engineering College, and Anna University (CEG Campus).
Frontend Development (React.js, Tailwind CSS, React Hook Form, Redux, Zod, React Router, GSAP), Backend as a Service (Supabase, Appwrite, Clerk Authentication), Web Animations, and API integrations.

Sticking to one goal without exploring multiple domains (though focused on frontend growth).
Become a skilled Frontend Engineer / Frontend Architect, create innovative software products, and build an AI-powered travel agent platform eliminating intermediaries.
